revised_title: The Efficacy of Oil of Olives in Treating Viper Bites: A Comparative Study between England and France
tldr: This article discusses the effectiveness of oil of olives in treating viper bites, comparing the results of experiments conducted in England and France. The author, M. Dufay, notes that while the remedy seems to be less effective in France, further experiments are needed to determine the reasons behind the difference in success rates.
